name: Escape The Evil Granny Momo
description:
Everything can create noise and noise can be dangerous. When you are trying to find out the door to release yourself many horrible things can create problem many Ghost and banshee will try to stop finding ghost and Banshee can be attacked and result you will die. Try to avoid to face ghost and banshee you do not acquire by the wrong spirits, find the right escape route from the dangerous haunted hospital

Features of the game:
• Scary apartment
• Animation
• Ghost and banshee movement
• Well designed 10 levels
• No time limit
